• Paletty

Paletty is an Android app which I have designed and developed for creators to Explore and Create palettes of different color schemes.

What makes Paletty different?

• Variety of color schemes You can select and save from over 15 types of color schemes. Each palettes are designed to generate harmonious colors for your use.

• Create large palettes You can create a palette containing a single color or up to 10 colors.

• Manage your palettes You can save or remove your favorite palettes without any hassle.

Try it
